channel.title: Fixed - Datmaker
channel.description:
Datmaker fixed so everyone can use it. http://uppit.com/3L6I6B
The problem was that alot of non english european locales use a comma for the decimal seperator instead of a full stop - who knew that?
------------
If it still says 'can not load mqo' please take a screen shot of the message and post it here. Should work for everyone now though.
- Creds: Mrpotatohead & R A M I

item.title: Fixed - Datmaker

item.description:
@R_A_M_I wrote:

Datmaker fixed so everyone can use it.
http://uppit.com/3L6I6B

The problem was that alot of non english european locales use a comma for the decimal seperator instead of a full stop - who knew that?

If it still says ‘can not load mqo’ please take a screen shot of the message and post it here. Should work for everyone now though.
